Vitamins.Deficiency: Night blindness, dry skin, weakened immune system
Cracks in the corners of the mouth, sore throat, inflammation of the lining of the mouth and tongue
Pellagra (symptoms include dermatitis, diarrhea, and dementia)
Rare, but can include fatigue, depression, and digestive problems
Anemia, depression, confusion, weakened immune function
